text: In honor of the men & women in uniform who have fallen for our freedom each year we remember and pay tribute to their selfless sacrifice. We can never repay them but we should always take the time to recognize their bravery and commitment to this great nation. #MemorialDay2022 http

.@USDOT awarded the Alabama and Tennessee River Railway $5M for a series of improvements between Birmingham and Guntersville. This project will be instrumental in providing safe efficient transportation of goods and services along the railway system and alleviating car traffic.
